duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan and execute flights in accordance with FAA regulations, company policies, and industry best practices.
Conduct pre-flight inspections to ensure aircraft is airworthy and properly equipped.
Monitor weather conditions and adjust flight plans as necessary.
Perform in-flight checks to ensure the aircraft is operating correctly.
Communicate effectively with air traffic control and ground crew.
Maintain accurate records of flight times, fuel consumption, and other data.
Respond quickly and effectively to any emergency situations that may arise.

education_certification.credential: A minimum of 500 hours on turbo jet aircraft
